title: Zambrano the latest personality in Marlins' mix
subtitle: Zambrano the latest personality in Marlins' mix
body: A naming rights deal for the Miami Marlins' new stadium has not yet been announced. Might I suggest Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey Ballpark? Whether this drastically reconstructed Marlins club is going to be a winner in a loaded National League East is a matter as yet undecided. Anthony Castrovince is a reporter for MLB.com. Read his columns and his blog, CastroTurf, and follow him on Twitter at @Castrovince. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Anthony Castrovince
